Considerable progress has been registered towards the attainment of objectives Despite the fact that the actual implementation of the project started in 2014 with a lengthy procurement process most of the hydrological and meteorological equipment has been purchased and delivered as well as installation in selected sites is ongoing Capacity building is also on track as a significant technical personnel from key institutions has received training thanks to the Department of Climate Change and Meteorological Services DCCMS and the Disaster Risk Management DoDMA who organised nine training courses ranging from 1 week to 24 months A list of the afforded capacity building initiatives has been uploaded for referencing
In relation to the set targets the baseline and the two indicators there was minimal quantifiable progress This reporting period was mainly dedicated to preparatory activities
